commit.message:
Rollup merge of #109461 - notriddle:notriddle/css-content, r=GuillaumeGomez

rustdoc: remove redundant `.content` prefix from span/a colors

Reverts a1d4ebe4961c107272f9764d1908227a3cd04092, as well as fixing the problem it solved with links losing their color.
